description.value: This chime features carvings of destructive runes. When activated, it creates the effects of a 3rd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Sound Burst]{Sound Burst} centered on you (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|basic:true|name:Warcaller's Chime Sound Burst|traits:sonic,uncommon|showDC:all] save). Instead of the spell's normal range, it has a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5]. In addition, creatures that critically fail their save are knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone} by the chime's effect. You can use this chime once per day.

source.value: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind
